description: All players who log into Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms through the Epic Games Store until Thursday, 11/13/2025 will receive Nixie's Champions of Renown Bundle Pack. This pack is worth over $100 USD and can be yours for FREE, just by logging in!
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Log in to Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms until Thursday 11/13/2025.
3. Please note the base game Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms (free to play) is required to enjoy this DLC content.
